sentences.en: When experts cite possible harm from the commercialization of laser enrichment, they often point to Iran.
sentences.cn: 当专家列举激光浓缩商业化可能带来的危害时，他们常常指向伊朗。

sentences.en: A season in the field will help determine which, if any, of the varieties are ready for commercialization.
sentences.cn: 田间的一个季节将有助于确定哪些品种，如果有的话，已准备好商业化。

sentences.en: There are three dozen universities in the UK which are actively engaged in advanced research training and commercialization work.
sentences.cn: 在英国，有36所大学积极从事高级研究培训和商业化工作。
